LanguageData.EM_MilkingSpot.description: Designate a spot to milk oneself
LanguageData.EM_MilkingPump.description: Hand pump for milking, can increase milking speed and yield
LanguageData.EM_MilkingElectric.description: Electric pump for milking. When powered, it can increase milking speed, and will always yield products. Can be used by non-humans
